refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A GtkProgress is the abstract base class used to derive a GtkProgressBar which provides a visual representation of the progress of a long running operation.

refsect2.title: struct GtkProgress
refsect2.para: The GtkProgress-struct struct contains private data only. and should be accessed using the functions below.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_set_show_text ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_set_show_text is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Controls whether progress text is shown.

listitem.simpara: a boolean indicating whether the progress text is shown.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_set_text_alignment ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_set_text_alignment is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Controls the alignment of the text within the progress bar area.

listitem.simpara: a number between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating the horizontal alignment of the progress text within the GtkProgress.
a number between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating the vertical alignment of the progress text within the GtkProgress.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_set_format_string ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_set_format_string is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para:
Sets a format string used to display text indicating the current progress. The string can contain the following substitution characters:
%v - the current progress value.
%l - the lower bound for the progress value.
%u - the upper bound for the progress value.
%p - the current progress percentage.

listitem.simpara: a string used to display progress text, or NULL to restore to the default format.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_set_adjustment ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_set_adjustment is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Associates a GtkAdjustment with the GtkProgress. A GtkAdjustment is used to represent the upper and lower bounds and the step interval of the underlying value for which progress is shown.

listitem.simpara: the GtkAdjustment to be associated with the GtkProgress.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_set_percentage ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_set_percentage is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the current percentage completion for the GtkProgress.

listitem.simpara: the percentage complete which must be between 0.0 and 1.0.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_set_value ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_set_value is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the value within the GtkProgress to an absolute value. The value must be within the valid range of values for the underlying GtkAdjustment.

listitem.simpara: the value indicating the current completed amount.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_get_value ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_get_value is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the current progress complete value.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_set_activity_mode ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_set_activity_mode is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A GtkProgress can be in one of two different modes: percentage mode (the default) and activity mode. In activity mode, the progress is simply indicated as activity rather than as a percentage complete.

listitem.simpara: a boolean, TRUE for activity mode.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_get_current_text ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_get_current_text is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the current text associated with the GtkProgress. This text is the based on the underlying format string after any substitutions are made.

listitem.simpara: the text indicating the current progress.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_get_text_from_value ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_get_text_from_value is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the text indicating the progress based on the supplied value. The current value for the GtkProgress remains unchanged.

listitem.simpara: an absolute progress value to use when formatting the progress text.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_get_current_percentage ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_get_current_percentage is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the current progress as a percentage.

listitem.simpara: a number between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating the percentage complete.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_get_percentage_from_value ()

warning.para: gtk_progress_get_percentage_from_value is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Returns the progress as a percentage calculated from the supplied absolute progress value.

listitem.simpara: a number between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating the percentage complete represented by value.

refsect2.title: gtk_progress_configure ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gtk_progress_configure (GtkProgress *progress, gdouble value, gdouble min, gdouble max);

warning.para: gtk_progress_configure is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Allows the configuration of the minimum, maximum, and current values for the GtkProgress.

listitem.para: If TRUE the GtkProgress is in activity mode, meaning that it signals something is happening, but not how much of the activity is finished. This is used when you're doing something that you don't know how long it will take.
Whether the progress is shown as text.
A number between 0.0 and 1.0 specifying the horizontal alignment of the text in the progress widget.
A number between 0.0 and 1.0 specifying the vertical alignment of the text in the progress widget.
